singlecell_input_mapper.singlecell_input_mapper.synapse_mapper

Created on Mar 30, 2012

@author: regger

Classes

ScalarField([mesh, origin, extent, spacing, ...])

implements 3D scalar field based on numpy array used for e.g.

SynapseDensity(cell, postCellType, ...)

Synapse density computation for one postsynaptic neuron and arbitrary presynaptic bouton and other postsynaptic PST densities

SynapseMapper([cell, synDist, isDensity])

SynapseMapper assigns synapses to neuron morphology self.cell is neuron SpatialGraph self.synDist is average synapse distribution (3D scalar field) self.isDensity: True - synapse distribution interpreted as avg density; actual number of synapses assigned is drawn from a Poisson distribution False - synapse distribution interpreted as actual number of synapses per voxel and directly assigned self.voxelEdgeMap: dictionary mapping synapse distribution mesh coordinates on list with pairs of indices that correspond to the edge and edgePt ID of all morphology points inside that voxel
class singlecell_input_mapper.singlecell_input_mapper.synapse_mapper.SynapseDensity(cell, postCellType, connectionSpreadsheet, exTypes, inhTypes, exPST, inhPST)[source]

Bases: object

Synapse density computation for one postsynaptic neuron and arbitrary presynaptic bouton and other postsynaptic PST densities

compute_cell_PST()[source]

called once to compute 3D length/surface area densities and combine them with length/surface area PST densities to yield connection-specific 3D PST density of the postsynaptic neuron

compute_synapse_density(boutonDensity, preCellType)[source]

main interface for computing synapses originating from presynaptic bouton density of given cell type If bouton density and cell PST don’t overlap or synapse density == 0 everywhere, return None

class singlecell_input_mapper.singlecell_input_mapper.synapse_mapper.SynapseMapper(cell=None, synDist=None, isDensity=True)[source]

Bases: object

SynapseMapper assigns synapses to neuron morphology self.cell is neuron SpatialGraph self.synDist is average synapse distribution (3D scalar field) self.isDensity: True - synapse distribution interpreted as avg

density; actual number of synapses assigned is drawn from a Poisson distribution False - synapse distribution interpreted as actual number of synapses per voxel and directly assigned

self.voxelEdgeMap: dictionary mapping synapse distribution mesh

coordinates on list with pairs of indices that correspond to the edge and edgePt ID of all morphology points inside that voxel

create_synapses(preType='Generic')[source]

main function; creates instantiation of synapses on cell from synapse distribution
